name: timers.yml
configuration:
spring:
  profiles: montana
  datasource:
    driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
    url: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres-montana/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-timers"
    username: "postgres"
    password: "1"
  jpa:
    database: postgresql
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect
    properties:
      hibernate:
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  jackson:
    serialization:
      fail_on_empty_beans: false
    deserialization:
      read_date_timestamps_as_nanoseconds: false
  jmx:
    default-domain: timers-app-jmx
  application:
    name: nttm-timers
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://nttm-auth-jwt-montana:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
equipCron: "50000"
initDelay: "1000"
server:
  port: 8080
nttm:
  url:
    prefix: http://nttm.montana.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io/nttm-task-handler
  auth:
    username: "timers_intgr"
    password: "t3MYH3vQ7FUecWmraht8"
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: configs/log4j2.yml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
